item.title: A Linux Development Desktop with VMware Horizon - Part III: Shell
item.description: Previous articles: A Linux Development Desktop with VMware Horizon - Part I: Horizon A Linux Development Desktop with VMware Horizon - Part II: Applications High ⚡️ Way to Shell The operationalization of platforms such as e.g. Kubernetes, or the use of tools for building services or applications such as Docker, requires in both cases the use of the command-line. There are dozens of great plugins, themes and extensions out there to pimp your shell so that it´ll help you to increase velocity as well as useability.
